summary: Adds several items to improve your chances of surviving as an unarmed character.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description:[/heading]
This mod adds 7 different types of knuckles, which increase your unarmed damage. The knuckles have no models, so don't worry if you can't see one, and stack with each other, to allow you to optimize your unarmed damage. They are crafted at the forge, and each require the previous knuckle in the recipe (excluding Iron Knuckles), as well as 1 leather strip and various ingots depending on which type of knuckle it is.

[heading]Updates:[/heading]
[b]Version 1.0:[/b]
[list]
[*]Initial release
[/list]
author: Shadow
